advisory.name: RLBA-2022:1900
advisory.synopsis: scap-security-guide bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for scap-security-guide is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: Openscap protection profile rules for rhel 8 are always notchecked.
Rule accounts_passwords_pam_faillock_enforce_local fails to remediate
[RHEL8/SCAP/RFE] Align SCAP pam_faillock with recommendation of pam_faillock manpage to use failock.conf
The rules CCE-80763-6 and CCE-83496-0 should not be there in RHEL CIS compliance policy
content_rule_audit_basic_configuration enforces using default buffer size (8192) for audit, which isn't always suitable on busy systems
oscap scans for xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_profile_ospp profile incorrectly flags 11-loginuid.rules and 30-ospp-v42.rules as altered if 10-base-config.rules is changed
[Regression] Cannot accept Licence due to USB keyboard and mouse being blocked (ISM profile) [rhel-8.6.0]
The CIS profile sets /etc/ssh/*key to 640 which prevents sshd from starting
rsyslog_encrypt_offload_* rules fail after ansible remediation
Rebase scap-security-guide in Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.6 to the latest upstream version
[RFE] RHV hypervisors hardening profile based on DISA STIG profile
Remediations for scan with xccdf_org.ssgproject.content_profile_ism_o do not actually remediate failed test results
Cannot remediate Configure Time Service Maxpoll Interval
Update source of CVE data in data stream
[BZ] [RHEL 8.X] Bash scripts for remediations on grub2_slub_debug and poisoning doesn't work on RHEL 8 as expected.
Update RHEL8 DISA STIG profile to V1R5
Profile ANSSI Enhanced is missing the rule selinux_state
Add krb5-workstation to ignored for RHV
configure_bashrc_exec_tmux now errors during remediation
ANSSI kickstart doesn't provide enough space for /usr
